bug.author: yaroslavvb
bug.summary: MIME encoding inconsistency for some files
bug.description:
Most of text files in my Files list open in browser, but occasionally a file will trigger a download. I suspect it's something to do with how the server reports Mime type which is inconstent for some reason IE, this file triggers a download <denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/yaroslavvb/Transformer-XL%20source%20code/runs/c81802pd/files>https://app.wandb.ai/yaroslavvb/Transformer-XL%20source%20code/runs/c81802pd/files</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23068/66522048-5cdafb00-eaa1-11e9-809b-3bbbb2aa082e.png></denchmark-link>

In the past year we've majorly reworked the CLI and UI for Weights & Biases. We're closing issues older than 6 months. Please comment to reopen.
